Pre-Game Insights: India will lock horns with Zimbabwe in the 3rd T20I on Wednesday, July 10 at the Harare Sports Club.
India equaled the series by 1-1 after defeating Zimbabwe in the second match.
Opener Abhishek Sharma stole the show with a breathtaking century in the second match.
Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, and Shivam Dube are back in the squad, potentially shaking up the batting order.
Samson might take over the wicketkeeping duties from Dhruv Jurel, while Jaiswal could partner skipper Gill at the top.
Zimbabwe will be looking for a comeback with better plans against the Indian side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Harare proves favourable for batting, as evidenced in the second T20 match between India and Zimbabwe.
